name: Squid Game (itch) (Farwal)
description:
Game based on the popular series on Netflix. It is not about inflicting copyright, project created in an educational way.

The game was developed in 26 hours, multiplayer, voice chat and two games from the series.

More content will be added in future updates.

* A new update 0.3 is coming. (Today new update, I will notify you by Twitter.) This game is free, but if you want to make a donation, thank you for valuing my work and your name will be in the game.
